    Guitarists By Whom I Have Been Intruiged

    Here is a growing list of guitarists that have blown my mind at one time or another. They’re in no particular order, although Curt Kirkwood and D. Boon and Ralph Spight are indeed my top three.

    In the case of some of them, I only listed the bands in which I was “into” them; for example, I loved Brian Baker in Minor Threat and Dag Nasty, but I’ve never heard his stuff in Bad Religion. I really really like Nels Cline’s solo stuff and especially the stuff he did with Mike Watt, but I haven’t really dug into his Wilco work yet.

    1. Curt Kirkwood (Meat Puppets)
    2. D. Boon (Minutemen)
    3. Ralph Spight (Victims Family)
    4. Nels Cline (various)
    5. Deke Dickerson (Untamed Youth/solo)
    6. Dr. Know (Bad Brains)
    7. Joe Baiza (Saccharine Trust)
    8. Eddie Van Halen
    9. Jimmy Page
    10. Jimi Hendrix
    11. Mark Knopfler
    12. Tom Verlaine (Television)
    13. Johnny Ramone
    14. Chuck Berry
    15. Eddie Roberts (New Mastersounds)
    16. Bryan Giles (Red Fang)
    17. Brian May
    18. Nile Rodgers
    19. Rocky George (Suicidal Tendencies)
    20. Scott Hill (Fu Manchu)
    21. Bucky Pope (Tar Babies)
    22. Ty Segall
    23. Eddie Roeser (Urge Overkill)
    24. John Kimbrough (Walt Mink)
    25. Dean Ween
    26. Gary Chester (Ed Hall)
    27. James Petralli (White Denim)
    28. Tommy Niemeyer (The Accüsed)
    29. Alex Lifeson
    30. Jack Endino
    31. Johnny Marr
    32. Andy Kerr (NoMeansNo)
    33. Rick Miller (Southern Culture on the Skids)
    34. Steve Turner (Mudhoney)
    35. Larry LaLonde
    36. East Bay Ray (Dead Kennedys)
    37. Peter Frampton
    38. Alan Anderson (PopDefect)
    39. Tom Pig (Poison Idea)
    40. Gavin MacArthur (Schlong)
    41. Duane Denison (Jesus Lizard)
    42. Angus Young
    43. Ian Williams (Don Caballero)
    44. J Mascis
    45. Jon Fine (Bitch Magnet)
    46. Brad Paisley
    47. Charlie Hunter
    48. Cory Wong
    49. Dexter Romweber (Flat Duo Jets)
    50. Dave Navarro
    51. J Robbins (Jawbox)
    52. Berton Averre (The Knack)
    53. Robby Krieger
    54. Jack White
    55. Mike Gent (Figgs)
    56. Billy Duffy
    57. Isaiah Mitchell (Earthless)
    58. Josh Homme
    59. Lindsey Buckingham
    60. Captain Sensible (Damned)
    61. Dave Diebler (House of Large Sizes)
    62. Brian Baker (Minor Threat/Dag Nasty)
    63. Tony Iommi
    64. Scotty Moore (Elvis)
    65. Ian MacKaye
    66. Joe Walsh
    67. Rick Sims (Didjits)
    68. Buzz Osbourne (Melvins)
    69. Stephen Egerton (ALL/Descendents)
    70. Andy Summers
    71. Billy Gibbons
    72. Justin Trosper (Unwound)
    73. Albert King
    74. Dick Dale
    75. Frank Zappa
    76. Slim Harpo
    77. Thurston Moore
    78. Lee Ranaldo
    79. Ed Crawford (fIREHOSE)
    80. John Fogerty
    81. Greg Ginn
    82. Tim Kerr (Big Boys)
    83. Billy Zoom (X)
    84. Stevie Ray Vaughan
    85. Dave Gonzalez (Paladins)
    86. David Immergluck (Monks of Doom)
    87. Greg Lisher (Camper van Beethoven/Monks of Doom)
    88. Bob Mould (Hüsker Dü)
    89. Link Wray
    90. Reverend Horton Heat
    91. Trey Anastasio
